alert.note: Alert for Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 1:58AM EST until December 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the lower elevations with 3 to 5 inches in the higher elevations above roughly 1200 feet. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex. In Pennsylvania, Monroe. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....Snow will develop near or shortly after sunrise and may mix with some sleet and rain at times by the afternoon, especially in the lower elevations, before changing back to snow Sunday night. The mix with rain will help limit accumulations in the lower elevations to generally the 1 to 3 inch range while up to 5 inches falls in the higher elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
